name: Botany room
description: There are plants everywhere.  Some you recognize and some you do not.  Some plants are still while others look like they want a good meal (meaning you).  Try to avoid getting eaten by a plant.  That would suck.  As you look around at the array of colors you find that something catches your eye.  On one of the plants that would eat you if given the chance there is some sparkling soil.  You need this magic soil but you must be very cautious.  Solve a problem to sneek by the plant and get the magic soil.

exits.description: There is a big purple plant this direction but you can't go that way.
There is some small blue plants this direction but you can't go that way.
There are some rainbow colored trees this direction but you can't go that way.
There is an orange flower this direction but it will eat you. Don't go that way.
This leads back to the space dock.
You've reached the food storage room
There is nothing in this direction.
There are several large plants above you.  Some look hungry be careful.
You are walking on a metal floor.

problemDescription: You must solve this problem to get the magic soil and not get eaten.
